scripts.switch:dev: gcloud config configurations activate develop && yarn glist
scripts.switch:prod: gcloud config configurations activate production && yarn glist
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn switch:prod && gcloud app deploy && yarn switch:dev
scripts.firestore:dev: firebase use stadium-gourmet-list-dev && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules
scripts.firestore:prod: firebase use stadium-gourmet-list && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules && firebase use stadium-gourmet-list-dev
scripts.index:dev: firebase use stadium-gourmet-list-dev && firebase deploy --only firestore:indexes
scripts.index:prod: firebase use stadium-gourmet-list && firebase deploy --only firestore:indexes && firebase use stadium-gourmet-list-dev
scripts.functions:dev: firebase use stadium-gourmet-list-dev && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.functions:prod: firebase use stadium-gourmet-list && firebase deploy --only functions && firebase use stadium-gourmet-list-dev
